mapper.update: update order_inf set order_sn = #{orderSn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shipping_comp_name = #{shippingCompName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipping_sn = #{shippingSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shipping_time = #{shippingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, receive_time = #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select order_id, order_sn, customer_id, shipping_comp_name, shipping_sn, create_time, shipping_time, receive_time, order_status from order_inf where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
